channel.title: The hp of monsters isnt saving O.o
channel.description:
how come the hp of my monster isnt saving? i went to the cfg. file where it lists all of the npc's and their hp (which is 0) and i changed the hp of the kalphite queen to 100, clicked on "save", exited the window, pulled up moparscape, spawned the kalphite queen, hit a 0, and it died
IF ANYONE COULD TELL ME WHY THE HP ISNT SAVING, I WOULD GREATLY APPRECIATE IT! THANK YOU
(also idk if this is normal or just me, but i can use teleport spells but not any other spells, even though i have 999m of each rune :confused:)
:confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused:

item.title: The hp of monsters isnt saving O.o
item.dc:creator: @I_pker_I I pker I
item.description:
@I_pker_I wrote:

okey dokies[br][size=1]Posted at: November 26, 2006, 10:52:26 AM[/size][hr]ur message that u sent confuses me a bit…[br][size=1]Posted at: November 26, 2006, 11:12:11 AM[/size][hr] :o :o :o :o :o :o :o :o :o :o im frustrated now, i feel stupid :o :o :o :o :o :o :o :o :o :o :o :o :o[br][size=1]Posted at: November 26, 2006, 11:18:03 AM[/size][hr]Hi, this is IpkerI’s dad… he’s shown me this thread, and I don’t wanna take up too much of your already-generously-given time, but there’s a chance you could clarify a couple of things.

I know what source code is, and I know what it means to compile it…but my impression of Moparscape is that it isn’t a code writing app; there do seem to be various text files which can be edited to change the conditions within the game, but that’s all I’ve seen in my brief glance… unless “Aryan” is an independent app.

So here are my questions:

when you say that my son should click on “compile” in his source, are you talking about a particular app within mpscape?

If so, could you walk us thorugh how to open the app and how to view the sourcecode you’re referring to?

Many thanks,

PKer’s dad

Read full topic

item.title: The hp of monsters isnt saving O.o
item.dc:creator: @Java_addict Java_addict
item.description:
@Java_addict wrote:

right compile is a short term for compilation which means a set of things brought together into one thing. Basically makes ur server join together so it works. You compile by clicking the thing in your source which says compile. then you have compiled then click Runserver and your server will be online.

Read full topic

item.description:

wat does compile mean? sorry im new to…well…computers basicly

thanks for ur help anyways (if u dont respond)[br][size=1]Posted at: November 26, 2006, 10:24:09 AM[/size][hr]ya see im very new to moparscape, i managed to spawn about 999m of everything valuable cuz i was bored lol… but im still on that server “IP” or watever, 127.0.0.1… so i wouldnt call that my own server yet

im still experimenting with text-scripts though
